verbs.description: orthographize (third-person singular simple present orthographizes, present participle orthographizing, simple past and past participle orthographized) (transitive)

entries.meaning: To spell correctly or according to usage.
To correct in regard to spelling.
examples: "In the" coalesced into "ith", which modern reaction has orthographized to "i' th".

entries.meaning: To devise a writing system for a language.
